about_the_game:
Darkflow is a sci-fi adventure RPG set beyond the veil of space where you play as a human merc who refuses to accept “no” as an answer. Fight your way out of the slums all the way to the top as you take on increasingly dangerous–and lucrative–jobs to make a name for yourself in all the circles that matter.

Discover cosmic mysteries.

Left with more questions than answers, you must navigate space marred by a war of betrayal on a galactic scale in a universe where being human alone is enough to make you a target. Accompanied by your loyal yet unpredictable companion, Styxx, begin your conquest to uncover the truth about your origin, what happened to humankind, and the mysterious fate of your lost home world.

Empowered with a unique link to powerful forgotten technology on the brink of a new war, how far will you go to discover your past?



Venture into the unknown.

Set 1,000 years after human civilization has fallen, Darkflow takes place in a universe that is still reeling from a long forgotten war. Featuring one of the most accurate representations of a black hole in any game or film, Darkflow brings an unprecedented space experience to you with stunning levels of fidelity.



Steal. Earn. Upgrade.

From the gritty confines of the shady space station Neon, you'll regroup, hit the streets, and kick back in your apartment as you prepare for your next contract. In the mercenary world, there are no free rides—surviving your next mission hinges on your crew, your gear, and your sheer determination to defy the odds.



Features
  • Meticulously designed for PC, Darkflow delivers an unparalleled gaming experience with graphics optimized for peak performance utilizing the latest Unreal Tech.
  • There are countless ways to navigate your galaxy. Gear up, gather intel and expand your crew to stay ahead.
  • Choices influence both story and side quests, through your dialog, actions and relationships. There is a deep story in Darkflow, but how you get there is up to you.
  • Experience the most state-of-the-art physics simulation in any game allowing you to explore deep space like ever before.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains science fiction depictions of violence against humanoid robots, and rarely some humans.
There is the rare occasion of gratuitous violence during some cutscenes.
This game contains some nudity.

name: Darkflow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 (Latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU - Intel: Sandy Bridge or later, AMD: Bulldozer or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.1 compatible Graphics Card with 8 GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 63 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: DARKFLOW will fully support Windows 8.1, however extensive testing and troubleshooting to ensure the game has proper compatibility in this operating environment is ongoing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (Latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU - Intel: Sandy Bridge or later, AMD: Bulldozer or later
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.1 compatible Graphics Card with 12+ GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 63 GB available space
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: DARKFLOW will fully support Windows 11, however extensive testing and troubleshooting to ensure the game has proper compatibility in this operating environment is ongoing.

short_description: Darkflow is a sci-fi adventure RPG that chronicles an epic, universe-spanning saga. Fight your way up from the slums to battle rival alien factions, take down cybernetically enhanced enemies, and discover the hidden powers pulling the strings.
